msg: Make sure that the tested ACL already contains something when trying to re-add the first entry

author: cbartlett
msg: Added static getFocusDecorator & setFocusDecorator methods to & Component
ApplicationContext now looks for a 'org.apache.pivot.wtk.debugfocuscolor' system property with a case insensitive value of 'red', 'green' or 'blue'.

author: jukka
msg: Use the FilteredRangeIterator class to implement FilteredEventIterator so that getSize() will return a good value and we can run more tests.

author: mturk
msg: Use the same API for shutdown and remove the extra shutdown function
